definition: to carry sb in a sedan chair/flatter/sing praises
to lift/to raise/(of two or more persons) to carry

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Why should we help fund capital Sedan Chair son do?
sentences.chinese: 为什么要帮助基金的资本抬轿子呢？

sentences.english: So many people flatter each other nowadays that the atmosphere of society has been ruined.
sentences.chinese: 抬轿子的人太多了，风气都被搞坏了。

definition: to beat the gong to clear the way/(fig.) to pave the way for sth
palanquin with eight carriers/(fig.) lavish treatment
(old) musicians at a wedding cortege or funeral procession/(fig.) trumpeter of sb's praises/booster
attendant of the bride or bridegroom at a wedding
to pull a carriage (of draft animal)
